pageContext.claim: “We started it. $1.6 billion. Now we got another $1.6 billion and we just got another. But I want to build it at one time, fast.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump inflated the money that has been appropriated — it’s $1.6 billion — and as we noted, that cannot be used for the wall. Trump appears to be adding the money authorized by Congress in the spring with another $1.6 billion proposed by lawmakers in a new spending bill -- and then adding another $1.6 billion on top of that.
